ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return status = int(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value) liberado = registro.Fields["LIBERADO"] statusSuspenso = 5 if status == statusSuspenso: widget.View.Commands["GRP_FUNCOES"].Items["CMD_SUSPENDER"].Title = "Reativar" else: widget.View.Commands["GRP_FUNCOES"].Items["CMD_SUSPENDER"].Title = "Suspender" statusEmElaboracao = 1 if (((status == statusEmElaboracao) and liberado) or (status > statusEmElaboracao)): widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False else: widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADITIVOS"].Visible = False
def OnCMD_COPIARExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirmar a c√≥pia do contrato?")
